# [`?`]{.blue}
 
 
### [?]{.blue}*thingy*{.center} 
 
# What it does 

+ Open the help file for an object that you don't understand.  It is useful to find variable definitions for some datasets and some function argument details.
  
 
# Demo code 

```{r eval=FALSE}
?women
```
  
 
# Usefull stuff 

+ Note: There is no help file for for men. [`?`]{.blue}men .
```{r}
?men
```
.related-functions[]
+ [`??`]{.blue} does a broader search in the local documentation.
